remarks: Scalar multiplication for the closed kernel vector space dual. (Contributed by NM, 20-Mar-2015.)
statement:
lcdsmul.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lcdsmul.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdsmul.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lcdsmul.l $e |- L = ( Base ` F ) $.
lcdsmul.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` F ) $.
lcdsmul.c $e |- C = ( ( LCDual ` K ) ` W ) $.
lcdsmul.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` C ) $.
lcdsmul.m $e |- .xb = ( .r ` S ) $.
lcdsmul.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
lcdsmul.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. L ) $.
lcdsmul.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. L ) $.
lcdsmul $p |- ( ph -> ( X .xb Y ) = ( Y .x. X ) ) $.
